pullRequest.title: [polish] In README Gradle snippet, put maven central repo first

nodes.bodyText: Maven Central generally is better declared first (since the first repo will be hit with the majority of requests).
I’ve removed the TODO but please correct me if I’m wrong. I understood the declaration that there are snapshots if someone wants to use them.

commit.message: Fix dependencies indentation in the readme (now on 3.2.x)

nodes.bodyText: that one is specific to 3.4 being in a milestone and was a TODO for me not to forget to remove milestones when 3.4.0 is GA. I'll fix it when forward merging, since this will be retargetted towards 3.2.x
ok that makes sense. I'd prefer to target all maintenance branches, so I'll rebase your branch on top of 3.2.x and fix my other comment below.
